Summary: Bright orange balls of light appearing and disapearing and forming various formations in the sky.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my kitchen after work getting some food and i noticed this really bright orange sphere in the sky ..i gave it a second look and since i was looking through a window i thought there may have been some sort of reflection..so i went out side and now there were 2 bright orange speheres in the sky..i wtched them for about 30 seconds and they just disapeared...so i went back inside and grabbed my camera hoping it may happen again..and dure enough it did..so i video taped the speheres comming and going...there were as many as 4 speheres at 1 point and they seemed to be forming triangles and rectangles in the sky and then they would disapear..and then anothere one would light back up....i live in oceanside and camp pendelton marine base is just n miles north of my home wich is exactly where i saw the sphere hovering.....i called the military base and couldnt get any info.... i have over 7 minutes of video of these bright orange spheres that looked like fireballs appearing and disapearing....i googled this and found a few other people have mentioned seeing the same thing in the same area .......but at different times than me. i really would like to know if anyone else has reported this ....all this is happeneing right around camp pendelton marine base......and this looks like absolutely no other light i have ever seen.... tried to rationalize and thought they may be high powered flares but they moved in an organized formation and held there position longer than a flare...i eveb have other planes that fly by while im fimimng and you can see that the spheres are nothing like the planes.....when i zoomed all the way in with my camera the spheres appeared to be pulsating or flashing at a high rate i looked very similar to fire.... i have vidoe of this and would be happy to share it if anyone is interested...please contact me and let me know if anyone else saw this and may know what it is?
